title: Skint Dad's lamb bhuna fakeaway
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons oil', '2 onions, chopped', '5g fresh root ginger, finely chopped', '2 cloves garlic, crushed', '1/2 teaspoon turmeric', '2 teaspoons ground coriander', '1/2 teaspoon ground cumin', '350g lamb, cubed', '1 (400g) tin tomatoes', '1 teaspoon chilli powder', '1 teaspoon garam masala', '1 pinch salt']
